00033     RenderTarget::RenderTarget()
00034     {
00035         // Default to no stats display
00036         mStatFlags = SF_NONE;
00037         resetStatistics();
00038     }
00039 
00040     RenderTarget::~RenderTarget()
00041     {
00042         // Delete viewports
00043         for (ViewportList::iterator i = mViewportList.begin();
00044             i != mViewportList.end(); ++i)
00045         {
00046             delete (*i).second;
00047         }
00048 
00049         // Write closing message
00050         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(
00051             LML_NORMAL,
00052             "Render Target '%s' Average FPS: %f Best FPS: %f Worst FPS: %f", 
00053             mName.c_str(), mAvgFPS, mBestFPS, mWorstFPS );
00054 
00055     }
00056 
00057     String RenderTarget::getName(void)
00058     {
00059         return mName;
00060     }

00066         height = mHeight;

00082 
00083     void RenderTarget::update(void)
00084     {
00085         mTris = 0;
00086         // Go through viewports in Z-order
00087         // Tell each to refresh
00088         ViewportList::iterator it = mViewportList.begin();
00089         while (it != mViewportList.end())
00090         {
00091             (*it).second->update();
00092             mTris += (*it++).second->_getNumRenderedFaces();
00093 
00094         }
00095 
00096         // Update statistics
00097         updateStats();
00098 
00099     }
00100 
00101     Viewport* RenderTarget::addViewport(Camera* cam, int ZOrder, float left, float top ,
00102         float width , float height)
00103     {
00104         char msg[100];
00105         // Check no existing viewport with this Z-order
00106         ViewportList::iterator it = mViewportList.find(ZOrder);
00107 
00108         if (it != mViewportList.end())
00109         {
00110             sprintf(msg, "Can't create another viewport for %s with Z-Order %i "
00111                 " because a viewport exists with this Z-Order already.",
00112                 this->getName().c_str(), ZOrder);
00113             Except(9999, msg, "RenderTarget::addViewport");
00114         }
00115         // Add viewport to list
00116         // Order based on Z-Order
00117         Viewport* vp = new Viewport(cam, this, left, top, width, height, ZOrder);
00118 
00119         mViewportList.insert(ViewportList::value_type(ZOrder, vp));
00120 
00121         return vp;
00122     }
00123 
00124     void RenderTarget::removeViewport(int ZOrder)
00125     {
00126         ViewportList::iterator it = mViewportList.find(ZOrder);
00127 
00128         if (it != mViewportList.end())
00129         {
00130             delete (*it).second;
00131             mViewportList.erase(ZOrder);
00132         }
00133     }
00134 
00135     void RenderTarget::removeAllViewports(void)
00136     {
00137 
00138 
00139         for (ViewportList::iterator it = mViewportList.begin(); it != mViewportList.end(); ++it)
00140         {
00141             delete (*it).second;
00142         }
00143 
00144         mViewportList.clear();
00145 
00146     }
00147     void RenderTarget::setStatsDisplay(StatFlags sf)
00148     {
00149         mStatFlags = sf;
00150 
00151     }

00153     void RenderTarget::getStatistics(float& lastFPS, float& avgFPS,
00154             float& bestFPS, float& worstFPS)
00155     {
00156 
00157         // Note - the will have been updated by the last render
00158         lastFPS = mLastFPS;
00159         avgFPS = mAvgFPS;
00160         bestFPS = mBestFPS;
00161         worstFPS = mWorstFPS;
00162 
00163 
00164     }

00184     void RenderTarget::resetStatistics(void)
00185     {
00186         mAvgFPS = 0.0;
00187         mBestFPS = 0.0;
00188         mLastFPS = 0.0;
00189         mLastFPS = 0.0;
00190         mWorstFPS = 999.0;
00191     }
00192 
00193     void RenderTarget::updateStats(void)
00194     {
00195         static float lastTime = 0.0f;
00196         static long numFrames  = 0;
00197 
00198         // Keep track of the time lapse and frame count
00199         float fTime = ((float)clock())/CLOCKS_PER_SEC; // Get current time in seconds
00200         ++numFrames;
00201 
00202         // Update the frame rate once per second
00203         if( fTime - lastTime > 1.0f )
00204         {
00205             // Don't update stats first time (first time includes init times)
00206             if (lastTime)
00207             {
00208                 mLastFPS = numFrames / (fTime - lastTime);
00209                 if (mAvgFPS == 0)
00210                     mAvgFPS = mLastFPS;
00211                 else
00212                     mAvgFPS = (mAvgFPS + mLastFPS) / 2;
00213 
00214                 if (mBestFPS < mLastFPS)
00215                     mBestFPS = mLastFPS;
00216 
00217                 if (mWorstFPS > mLastFPS)
00218                     mWorstFPS = mLastFPS;
00219             }
00220 
00221 
00222             lastTime = fTime;
00223             numFrames  = 0;
00224         }
00225 
00226         // Display the stats
00227         char strStats[255];
00228         int iLine;
00229 
00230         iLine = 0;
00231 
00232         // HACK
00233         // Prevents inexplicable framerate drop in some cases when frame counters are turned off??!?!?
00234         outputText(0,512, "");
00235 
00236         if (mStatFlags != SF_NONE)
00237         {
00238             if (mStatFlags & SF_FPS)
00239             {
00240                 sprintf(strStats, "Current FPS: %.2f", mLastFPS);
00241                 outputText(0,iLine*16,strStats);
00242                 iLine++;
00243             }
00244             if (mStatFlags & SF_AVG_FPS)
00245             {
00246                 sprintf(strStats, "Average FPS: %.2f", mAvgFPS);
00247                 outputText(0,iLine*16,strStats);
00248                 iLine++;
00249             }
00250             if (mStatFlags & SF_BEST_FPS)
00251             {
00252                 sprintf(strStats, "Best FPS: %.2f", mBestFPS);
00253                 outputText(0,iLine*16,strStats);
00254                 iLine++;
00255             }
00256             if (mStatFlags & SF_WORST_FPS)
00257             {
00258                 sprintf(strStats, "Worst FPS: %.2f", mWorstFPS);
00259                 outputText(0,iLine*16,strStats);
00260                 iLine++;
00261             }
00262             if (mStatFlags & SF_TRIANGLE_COUNT)
00263             {
00264                 sprintf(strStats, "Tris: %d", mTris);
00265                 outputText(0,iLine*16,strStats);
00266                 iLine++;
00267             }
00268         }
00269 
00270     }
00271 
00272     void RenderTarget::getCustomAttribute(String name, void* pData)
00273     {
00274         Except(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Attribute not found.", "RenderTarget::getCustomAttribute");
00275     }
